snippet: The slumping Rangers trail their metropolitan rivals, the Devils and the Islanders, while the Pittsburgh Penguins lead the Eastern Conference after beating Boston.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins defeat Boston Bruins, 2-1, to lead Eastern Conference with only 21 games to play and New York Rangers in 10th place; other hockey scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: The slumping Rangers trail their metropolitan rivals, the Devils and the Islanders, while the Pittsburgh Penguins lead the Eastern Conference after beating Boston.

headline.seo: Rangers in an Odd Place With Penguins in First
headline.main: While Sliding Rangers Look Up in Standings, the Surging Penguins Look Down
headline.print_headline: While Sliding Rangers Look Up in Standings, the Surging Penguins Look Down
